e4260308b8d8bfee9d916a6e35ac6d91dc9d7312","dweb:/ipfs/QmNmQNtxECyZU5qXKtR4QhVxyW6onKkau74RnBRYxu3rCG"]},"contracts/interfaces/IStETH.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5a70bd9c7f58e2ffd8bde4444d358be2a58b40bb49282673591efcbf3d5a8dc7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5a1e32863741f5e7cb909d8b2fbd48f68d1d852f306b7736595becb774883a50","dweb:/ipfs/Qmcnh8Ujdb8zkWReUXADrfx4yopkB3YHj7dPm59iwozoFj"]}},"version":1}

gameOverWithEntropy(uint256).details: Access: game only. Used by advanceGame to centralize RNG.

runPresaleDailyFromGame(uint256,uint48).details: Access: game only. Pays buyer lane BURNIE, burn-lane BURNIE, and DGNRS lane.

shutdownPresale().details: Manual flag; does not end presale until the next daily run.

sweepExpiredPools().details: Callable by anyone; destination is fixed to the vault.

gameOver().notice: Burn DGNRS to enter the active jackpot.

gameOverEntropyAttempted().notice: True after gameOver() attempts to fetch entropy.

gameOverStarted().notice: True after game signals shutdown; disables deposits and bank pushes.

payBonds(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Unified deposit: external callers route ETH into the current maturity.

rewardStakeTargetBps().notice: Target share of stETH (in bps) for game-held reward liquidity.

runPresaleDailyFromGame(uint256,uint48).notice: Run daily presale payouts using game-supplied entropy.

shutdownPresale().notice: Queue presale shutdown after the next jackpot time.

sweepExpiredPools().notice: Sweep all funds (ETH + stETH) to the vault 1 year after game over.
